snippet: Eric Schlosser describes "Command and Control" as a Cold War book told through the eyes of ordinary service people, not policy-makers.
abstract: Eric Schlosser describes "Command and Control" as a Cold War book told through the eyes of ordinary service people, not policy-makers.

headline.main: 'Fast Food Nation' Author Will Return With Book on Nuclear Weapons
headline.print_headline: ‘Fast Food Nation’ Author To Write About Weapons
